mapper.select: SELECT gy_seq, mb_id, gy_title, gy_content, gy_create_at, gy_update_at FROM jsp.gallery order by gy_update_at desc
SELECT gy_seq, mb_id, gy_original_file_name, gy_new_file_name, gy_file_path, gy_file_size FROM jsp.gyfiles order by gy_file_size
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jsp.gyfiles ( gy_seq, mb_id, gy_original_file_name, gy_new_file_name, gy_file_path, gy_file_size ) VALUES ( #{gySeq}, #{mbId}, #{gyOriginalFileName}, #{gyNewFileName}, #{gyFilePath}, #{gyFileSize} )
mapper.update: UPDATE jsp.gallery SET gy_seq=#{gySeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, gy_title=#{gyTitle}, gy_content=#{gyContent}, gy_update_at=now() WHERE gy_seq=#{gySeq}

UPDATE jsp.gyfiles SET gy_seq=#{gySeq}, mb_id=#{mbId}, gy_original_file_name=#{gyOriginalFileName}, gy_new_file_name=#{gyNewFileName}, gy_file_path=#{gyFilePath}, gy_file_size=#{gyFileSize} WHERE gy_seq=#{gySeq}
mapper.select: SELECT gy_seq, mb_id, gy_title, gy_content, gy_create_at, gy_update_at FROM jsp.gallery where gy_seq = #{gySeq}
